title: Why am i still Stunned? ( Ornn BUG?)
body:
if anyone knows anything about the full extent on Ornn Unstoppable effect where he blocks CC, i just want to know if his W doesn't stop him from getting stunned or if it's a bug and he's actually supposed to be able to overcome stuns. every form of CC I can deal with but for some reason STUNS still go through. 
I mean i can still get through SUPPRESS and that's more op than stun, i just want to know if ornn ACTUALLY CAN'T stop STUNS or if it's a BUG that needs to be FIXED. SINCERELY {{champion:516}}

replies.body: Only time I have this issue is when i'm playing against Irelia.
